name: generate_image
description: Generates an image from a given prompt, prompt and loras parameters are required.

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.description: A very descriptive prompt for the image to generate in a tag format seperated by commas, make sure you're using LoRA's relevant to the prompt if possible

loras.name: loras
loras.description: Comma seperated LoRA's to use, if relevant LoRA's aren't available, write the characters name or species in a LoRA type format. LoRA's available: <lora:Michiru>, <lora:Braixen>, <lora:Vore>
